content: Up for auction is a rare and hard to find special edition 2014 Volume 2/Issue 1 yBitcoin St Petersburg Bitcoin Bowl magazine plus a Fortune Magazine “Crypto Vs Wall Street” edition. AUCTION TERMSItem for Sale: St Petersburg Bitcoin Bowl Special Edition yBitcoin Magazine + Fortune Magazine “Crypto Vs Wall Street”   Starting Bid: 0.0025 BTCMinimum Bid Increment: 0.0001 BTCAuction End Time: Saturday July 30th @ 6PM Eastern Standard Time (New York time)- Countdown Timer- https://www.timeanddate.com/countdown/generic?iso=20220730T18&p0=179&msg=St+Pete+Magazine+Auction+Timer&font=cursiveSniping:  No sniping. 10 minute standard sniping rule. All lots extended with any bid to any lot...https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5277761.0Shipping: Paid for by buyer. Ships from USA. Buyer responsible for any and all customs/dutiesPayment Address:  bc1qugzqh8483xasmzh2qgkzpuygh68rqgllrkxe4r ( I WILL NOT PRIVATE MESSAGE YOU A BITCOIN ADDRESS, BEWARE OF SCAMMERS)Payment Due: Within 24 hoursEscrow: Available at cost of buyer
